All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Main application class for managing the game state, saves, and user interface.
Colony
Represents a colony in the game, managing resources, settlers, and structures.
E_GameOver
 
E_LostSettler
Event representing a lost settler joining or being ignored by the colony.
E_Raid
Event representing a raid on the colony by hostile forces.
Event
 
EventFactory
Factory class for creating Event instances based on EventTypes.
EventTypes
Enum representing the different types of events that can occur in the game.
FileLoadException
 
FileSaveException
 
Impactable
Interface for classes that can impact a colony production.
ImpactableChoice
Interface for classes that can impact a colony production based on a choice.
InvalidAppStateException
 
MaxHabitantLimitException
 
Names
 
NotEnoughResourcesException
 
PopulationLimitException
 
S_Barracks
 
S_Factory
 
S_Farm
 
S_Hospital
 
S_House
 
S_Mine
 
S_WoodCuttersLodge
 
Settings
Holds all configurable game settings, loaded from XML files.
Settler
Represents a settler in the colony, with attributes for health, happiness, and impacts.
Structure
Abstract base class for all structures in the colony.
StructureFactory
Factory class for creating Structure instances based on StructureTypes.
StructureTypes
Enum representing the different types of structures available in the game.
UI
Interface for user interface implementations.
UI_Console
 
UI_Controller
 
UI_EventMenu
 
UI_MainMenu
 
UI_Menu

UI_PlayMenu
 
UI_SavesMenu
 
UI_SettingsMenu
 
UI_Swing
 
Utils
Utility class providing helper methods for UI and input handling.
XMLParser
Utility class for parsing and writing XML files for settings and colonies.
